testcase.name: noteSchema > createNoteSchema > should validate a valid note
noteSchema > createNoteSchema > should reject text shorter than 3 characters
noteSchema > createNoteSchema > should reject text longer than 500 characters
noteSchema > createNoteSchema > should accept text with exactly 3 characters
noteSchema > createNoteSchema > should accept text with exactly 500 characters
noteSchema > createNoteSchema > should reject empty taskId
noteSchema > createNoteSchema > should reject missing text field
noteSchema > createNoteSchema > should reject missing taskId field
noteSchema > deleteNoteSchema > should validate a valid note id
noteSchema > deleteNoteSchema > should reject empty id
noteSchema > deleteNoteSchema > should reject missing id field
notesSelectors > selectNotes > should return all notes
notesSelectors > selectNotes > should return empty array when no notes
notesSelectors > selectLoading > should return loading state
notesSelectors > selectLoading > should return false when not loading
notesSelectors > selectError > should return error message
notesSelectors > selectError > should return null when no error
notesSelectors > selectSearchQuery > should return search query
notesSelectors > selectFilteredNotes > should return all notes when search query is empty
notesSelectors > selectFilteredNotes > should filter notes by search query (case insensitive)
notesSelectors > selectFilteredNotes > should return multiple matches
notesSelectors > selectFilteredNotes > should return empty array when no matches
notesSelectors > selectFilteredNotes > should ignore whitespace-only search query
notesSelectors > selectNotesCount > should return total count of notes
notesSelectors > selectNotesCount > should return 0 for empty notes
notesSelectors > selectFilteredNotesCount > should return count of filtered notes
notesSelectors > selectFilteredNotesCount > should return total count when no filter
notesSlice > setNotes > should set notes array
notesSlice > setNotes > should replace existing notes
notesSlice > addNote > should add a note to the beginning of the array
notesSlice > addNote > should add note to empty array
notesSlice > removeNote > should remove a note by id
notesSlice > removeNote > should not change state if note id not found
notesSlice > setLoading > should set loading to true
notesSlice > setLoading > should set loading to false
notesSlice > setError > should set error message
notesSlice > setError > should clear error with null
notesSlice > setSearchQuery > should set search query
notesSlice > setSearchQuery > should update existing search query
notesSlice > clearNotes > should clear all notes and error
